tool_description: With the use of our API you may scrape profile urls for social media like LinkedIn, TikTok, Instagram, Amazon, Pinterest, twitter, twitch, Facebook, SnapChat, YouTube local yellow papers and more.
name: Universal Web Scraper
title: Universal Web Scraper

api_list.name: /parser/{id}/{timestamp}
/health
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://universal-web-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/health"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "universal-web-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://universal-web-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/health"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "universal-web-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
